Prologue_1: ^A crew composed of the brightest minds in the galaxy are sent on a mission aboard the Vespira to see what lies at the end of the universe...what exists beyond the Edge?
^Lieutenant Dover, the Vespira's communication officer, has become a trusted confidant for the crew. When they have trouble, they come to them.
^The mission is three days away from arrival at the Edge. Everyone is scrambling to prepare and tensions tighten.
^Dover has a choice: mend the problems between the crew or stir the pot?
Day1_Baha_JV: ^Lt Dover "Nothing much, as per usual. And sure thing.
^Officer JV "Captain Baha Blast! It’s your favorite lead engineer.
^Officer JV "Ergo, your favorite. Got a minute to clear some pre-arrival checks?
^Officer JV ""Copy". Our daily perimeter checks and gear assessments are all squeaky clean...
^Officer JV "But…the steering gear’s being a bit sticky.
^Cpt Baha "“Sticky”, is that the technical term for it?
^Officer JV "Oh, absolutely. I need your “official permission” to cycle them through a cleaning and that oughta do the trick.
^Cpt Baha "You’ve already started it haven’t you?
^Officer JV "Don’t touch the helm for the next hour or we’ll all explode and die.
^Officer JV "Wow, Baha Blast. What ever are you gonna do with all this free time? Got any sappy prose you need my highly attuned literary opinion on?
^Officer JV "Come on C.B., share your art with me!
^Cpt Baha "Maybe another time. Too many philistines on the bridge.
^Officer JV "Careful, Baha. You’re starting to sound like Ducksly.
^Officer JV "...I gotta go. Steering will be back within the hour, EVERYTHING'S FINE!
Day1_Baha_Ducksly: ^Emperor Ducksly "QUACK. Please, don’t call me that.
^Cpt Baha "Mhm. What can I do for you Ducksly?
^Emperor Ducksly "Captain, we’ve been over this. When someone greets you with "Quackcelsior" you’re supposed to-
^Cpt Baha "Ducksly, I don't have all day.
^Emperor Ducksly "I was looking over the pre-arrival checklist you sent out and I noticed there was an item for medical check-ups on the crew.
^Emperor Ducksly "Well, it's just that the equipment that I would need is currently in use.
^Emperor Ducksly "Well, as our science officer, and since our mission departure, I thought it would be fruitful to conduct a bit of research...
^Cpt Baha "That’s nice and all, but eminent arrival takes priority. I’m sure you can spare some equipment from your “non-regulated research”.

^Emperor Ducksly "But, Captain! We’ve been traveling faster than light for the better part of a galactic year on our way to the Edge! How many species get to experience life at such speed? What does that do to a species' physiology?
^Cpt Baha "That’s fascinating, Ducksly, it truly is. But -
^Emperor Ducksly "Exactly, Captain! I could be the first to know what happens to life at this scale! If I were to redistribute the equipment at this juncture, it would -
^Cpt Baha "Ducksly, please just get the medical checks done.
^Emperor Ducksly "But think of how our bodies might’ve changed just over these few months -
^Cpt Baha "Yes, but that’s not our mission. I’m sorry to say it, but your research is going to have to be put on the back burner.
^Emperor Ducksly "Captain, PLEASE. I must ask you to reconsider! This is just as important to me as our mission.
^Cpt Baha "It's not about YOU. I need those check ups done. Alright?
^Emperor Ducksly "If J.V asked for some equipment for some smooth-brained project, you wouldn’t hesitate to grant her leniency...
^Cpt Baha "How about you let Officer Veldspar worry about her portion of the checklist and you worry about yours, Officer Ducksly. Get those checks DONE.
^Cpt Baha "The crew doesn’t just need these check ups. I need them. Ok?
Day1_PrivateConvoChoice: ^Cpt Baha "Comms Officer Dover, do you have a moment?
^Officer JV "Heyyy Dover, me again. You got a sec?
^Emperor Ducksly "Bonjour, Dover. Might we have a tête-à-tête?
Day1_Dover_Baha: ^Lt Dover "Guess I'll see how the Captain is doing.
^Cpt Baha "Dover. Thanks for picking up. I hope I'm not taking you away from your responsibilities.
^Lt Dover "No need to apologize Captain! Not much going on over here right now.
^Cpt Baha "You know how it is. Everyone's getting their pre-arrival checks in on schedule.
^Lt Dover "Oh for sure, I can hear people running around, the switchboard's been on fire.

s: ^As secure as it can be, Captain.

g-0: ^Cpt Baha "Whatever is said stays between you, me, and the Vespira, eh?
^Cpt Baha "I know this is your first voyage with this crew, I hope they've been treating you well?

c-0: ^Cpt Baha "Glad to hear it. I imagine it can feel pretty cooped up in there, all on your own.
g-0: ^Cpt Baha "I actually just got off the comms with Ducksly not too long ago.
^Lt Dover "Hard to tell if something is acutally serious with that one sometimes.
^Cpt Baha "Apparently, they've got too many experiments going on to actually start on their checklist.
g-1: ^Cpt Baha "Either way... I shouldn't have to ask my science officer to do their job.

s: ^Don't their experiments kinda count as health check ups?
^This is your ship, Captain. Your word is law.

DefendDucksly_Response: ^Lt Dover "Well, that means if something was wrong with one of our bodies they would've already notified you?
BackUpBaha_Response: ^Cpt Baha "You're right. You know I don't like to be the bad guy,but we need to maintain order.
OtherProblem: ^Cpt Baha "Regardless of the experiments, Ducksly has displayed zero care for the ship, nevermind anyone on this crew.
^Cpt Baha "Hmm. I just don't know what to do with them.
^Cpt Baha "I've served with a lot of hard heads over the course of my career, but Ducksly...

s: ^Maybe you should take interest in their work? Might open them up a bit more?
^Inviting our crew to happy hours might be worth something.

g-0: ^Cpt Baha "Definitely something to consider. Thank you, Dover.

c-0: ^Cpt Baha "Glad to hear it. I imagine it can feel pretty cooped up in there, all on your own.
g-0: ^Cpt Baha "Yes, J.V.’s always been chipper, that one. Known her a long time myself.
^Cpt Baha "Lt. Dover, do you have any hobbies?

s: ^I was big into reality TV shows back on Earth.
^I've been known to read a novel or two.

c-2: ^Cpt Baha "I always found those a little crass...people can be so cruel to one another.

g-1: ^Cpt Baha "You know, I’m a writer myself.
^Lt Dover "Oh, I bet with a career as long as yours, you have some adventures to write about.
^Cpt Baha "Oh no, I’m no Jules Verne. I’m more of an Brontë-man.
^Lt Dover "Sir, I would never have guessed.
^Cpt Baha "Oh no, I’ve never shared my work with anyone. Except J.V. of course.

s: ^If J.V. says your writing is good, I’m sure it is.
^Do you think J.V. is the best critic?

c-4: ^Cpt Baha "Perhaps you’re right. I should open up a bit, connect with the crew, as it were.
c-5: ^Cpt Baha "She wouldn’t lie to me, would she? We’ve known each other so long…

g-2: ^Lt Dover "Only one way to find out, Sir.
^Cpt Baha "I’ll see about sending you an excerpt. Thank you for the chat, Lt. Dover.

Day1_Dover_JV: ^Lt Dover "Guess I'll see what's up with J.V.
^Lt Dover "Yup, looks like I can squeeze you in.
^Officer JV "I'll only need a minute, I promise. Just wanted to vent about something.

g-0: ^Officer JV "All I'm saying is that the Captain should always be on call for his crew.

s: ^There will be other chances to call him Baha Blast.
^He just didn't answer this one time. It's hardly the end of the world.

c-2: ^Officer JV "(Groans) You pass up the gig of a lifetime so you can stay on the ship of your favorite captain, the least he could do is answer.
c-3: ^Officer JV "It's not just this "one time" though.

D1_JV_BJV: ^Officer JV "I feel like he still doesn't take me seriously.
^Lt Dover "What do you mean? You're Head of Engineering, I don't think it gets much more serious than that.
^Officer JV "It's not my position on the crew, it's me and my friend.

s: ^You've known each other a long time.

c-0: ^Officer JV "Since my first grunt rotation. 'Plucked me from obscurity'.
c-1: ^Officer JV "It hasn't before. 10 years we've known each other. I don't know what's changed.

D1_DJV_Continue1: ^Officer JV "Ever since we left on this mission, Baha's been such a hardass.
^Lt Dover "To be honest, I wouldn't want to be in the Captain's shoes.
^Officer JV "(Chuckling) Yeah, you'd look like a clown in them.
^Officer JV "I don't know...We used to be really close, but now it's like he hardly wants to talk. Not about the real stuff.
^Lt Dover "I'm sure you guys will find time to chat.
^Officer JV "We do! And when we do it's great! But just getting him to chat is such a struggle now.
^Officer JV "I just want us to go back to being our little squad.

s: ^Sometimes, people drift apart. Might be a sign to let go, move on.
^You should tell him how you feel.

D1_JV_DistanceBaha: ^Lt Dover "We're coming up on the Edge, the literal end of everything. Why not?
^Officer JV "I guess I would just feel bad.
^Lt Dover "Don't! It happens. You don't have to be mean, but you don't have to keep trying if he's not.
^Officer JV "I'd miss out on his writing (chuckles).
^Officer JV "But maybe you're right. Thanks, Doverino!
D1_JV_ReconcileBaha: ^Officer JV "Share my feelings with Captain Stoicism? That's a big yikes for me.
^Officer JV "Did you not just hear me say-
^Lt Dover "I know what you said, but we're coming up on the Edge, the literal end of everything. Now's the perfect time to put things right.
^Lt Dover "How about this: What if when we reach the Edge, and all that's there is a blank void inhabited by an incompressible space squid monster.
^Lt Dover "You wanna die on bad terms with the Captain in that scenario?
^Officer JV "You think there's a giant space squid monster?
^Lt Dover "What? No, it was... That's not the point J.V.
^Officer JV "No, you're right. If there is a space squid monster, Baha and I will challenge it head on together.
Day1_Dover_Ducksly: ^Lt Dover "Alright Dover, prep yourself. Let's see what Ducksly wants.
^Emperor Ducksly "Thank you for taking time to speak with me, Dover. I wont take too much of your time.
^Lt Dover "No worries, it's not like I've got anything else going on.
^Emperor Ducksly "I'm sure. Something has troubled me recently  and I wanted to run my thoughts past a kind ear.
^Emperor Ducksly "Since you're the only humanoid here I remotely trust with something like this, I figured that kind ear might as well be you.
D1_D_BD: ^Emperor Ducksly "It's about my recent conversation with the Captain.
^Emperor Ducksly "As I'm sure you know I've been conducting physiological experiments on the crew.
^Emperor Ducksly "Well, after my conversation with the Captain I've been instructed to abandon my projects and focus entirely on our arrival checkups.

g-0: ^Emperor Ducksly "I could not disagree more with the Captain's request. I need him to understand the importantance of my experiments.
^Lt Dover "Did you try to explain it to him?
^Emperor Ducskly "Lieutenant, I assure you I conveyed my displeasure to the Captain as succinctly and respectfully as possible!

s: ^Have you ever considered that maybe you guys are on the same team?
^If the Captain doesn't know, He can't be upset can he?

D1_D_ImproveDBH: ^Lt Dover "Your experiments are centered around monitoring our bodies over the course of the ship -
^Emperor Ducksly "Actually, it's studying the effects of prolonged exposure to faster than light travel on a biological entity's phsyio-
^Lt Dover "And the Captain wants you to conduct health check ups before we reach our destination.

s: ^Come on, Ducksly. I set up the dots, now you just need to connect them.
^You guys literally want the same thing!

g-0: ^Emperor Ducksly "Oh! Eure-quack! Lieutenant, I see now what you are summarizing!
^Emperor Ducksly "Thank you, I'll be sure to explain to the Captain how our agendas truly align.

D1_D_WorsenDBH: ^Emperor Ducksly "Are you suggesting that I subvert the Captain's orders?
^Lt Dover "I wouldn't say 'subverting'. You'd still be following his orders, just not telling him...the other bits.
^Emperor Ducksly "Hmm...This could result in a mutually victorious scenario...

s: ^"But..if I were you, I wouldn't tell the Captain.

g-0: ^Emperor Ducksly "But, could this be construed as treason?
^Emperor Ducksly "QUACK. You're right. I won't question your un-feathered wisdom further.
^Lt Dover "It will be our little secret.

D1_D_BJV: ^Emperor Ducksly "It was to do with Officer Veldsapr.
^Emperor Ducksly "I'm sure you're aware of Officer Veldspar's relationship to the Captain?
^Emperor Ducksly "I quite frankly don't understand what the Captain sees in that bumbling slacker.
^Emperor Ducksly "No respect for chain of command. Wastes time making nonsensical games with the ships systems -
^Lt Dover "She played a prank on you didn't she?
^Emperor Ducksly "Regardless, when I was asking the Captian to continue my experiments, I have a strong feeling that if I were Officer Veldspar he would have allowed me to continue.
^Lt Dover "I doubt that. They migh be close but when the Captain wants something done, it usually gets done.
^Emperor Ducksly "I'm just having a hard time understanding what the Captain sees in her.

s: ^Maybe you should try getting to really know J.V?

g-0: ^Lt Dover "I mean what else do you have to lose.
^Emperor Ducksly "This will be new to me. But if it means I'll understand what the Captain sees in her, then so be it.
^Emperor Ducksly "Thank you again Lieutenant Dover. Your assistance is appreciated.

Day2_Start: ^Cpt Baha "Hello, Lieutenant. Would you mind patching me through to Officer Veldspar in Engineering? Need to go over a few more things on her pre-arrival checklist.
^Emperor Ducksly "Quackcelsior Lieutenant Dover! Do you mind connecting me to Officer Veldspar in her den of chaos in Engineering? I have a maintenance request, amongst other things.
Day2_JV_Baha: ^Lt Dover "You got it, Captain. Patching you in now.
^Officer JV ""I don't wanna wait...for our liiiiives to be over..."
^Officer JV ""I want to know right now what will it beeeeeheheheeee..."
^Cpt Baha "Sorry to have disturbed your karaoke session.
^Officer JV "I would consider it more of a recording sesh, I'm a shoe in for a Space Grammy.
^Officer JV "Ha...how can I help you today, Captain?
^Cpt Baha "I wanted to follow up on our conversation yesterday. My writing?
^Cpt Baha "Whatever you want to call it, I prepared a sample.
^Officer JV "Oooooh, yes please. Hold on, let me dust off my bongos.
^Cpt Baha "It's not a poetry reading, it's...romance.
^Officer JV "Shut the airlock door, you're kidding.
^Cpt Baha "I do not joke about my art.
^Officer JV "So you admit that it's your 'ART'?
^Cpt Baha "Do you want to hear it or not?
^Cpt Baha ""She looked out the paned window, fogged with her longing sighs."
^Cpt Baha ""The moor stretched out into the morning mist; she hadn't slept a wink."
^Cpt Baha ""He was out there. Fenton was out there."
^Cpt Baha ""Fenton, materializing from the mist, his shirt billowing in the damp air."
JV_B_PositiveReview: ^Officer JV "I totally do! Look, I may not be the most literary creature in the world, but that sounded really pretty to me.
^Officer JV "Maybe a little silly at times -
^Officer JV "But there's nothing wrong with "silly"! I say lean into that even more! If you're gonna do genre like this, really go for it, ya know?
JV_B_NegativeReview: ^Officer JV "Maybeeeee I'm not actually the best person to give you critical reviews on this sort of thing...
^Officer JV "No, no, I didn't say that -
^Cpt Baha "But you have nothing to say about it. Nothing positive anyways.
^Officer JV "Ok, don't get mad at me.
^Cpt Baha "I'm not mad at you. I just wish you'd be honest. Out of everyone on this ship, I thought I could count on that from you.
Day2_JV_Ducksly: ^Emperor Ducksly "Of course, it is not as if time is of the essence.
^Officer JV "What's up, duck-breath? I'm kinda busy.
^Emperor Ducksly "Is that so? Pray tell, Officer Veldspar. What could you possibly be busy with?
^Officer JV "Oh yeah no, nothing too important. Just making sure the ship doesn't explode and we don't get jettisoned from the Vespira. Casual stuff.
^Officer JV "I'm just kidding Ducksly. Relax! I mean... I am actually doing that, but we're not in any 'immediate' danger. So, what's up?
^Emperor Ducksly "Well, I need to make a maintenance request.
^Emperor Ducksly "It's one of my centrifuges. Someone tampered with it, turned it into a slapdash blender. I wonder who could've -
^Emperor Ducksly "ALL my work is mission critical!
^Officer JV "Sorry Duck, Captain's orders. Anything not mission critical is bumped to the bottom of the maintenance request list.
^Emperor Ducksly "But my centrifuge! I need it for -
^Officer JV "Then sorry, bud. No can do.
^Emperor Ducksly "I know YOU tampered with with my centrifuge! Who else could've done it?
^Officer JV "Are you sure it wasn't one of your medical staff?
^Officer JV "It could have been someone trying to make a move on your position...
^Officer JV "Ha, I'm just messing with you, Ducksly. Yeah I did it!
^Officer JV "Sorry, I just wanted to mess with you a little bit.
^Officer JV "I can fix it, it's really not big a deal.
GetToKnow_JV: ^Emperor Ducksly "Are these pranks of yours why the Captain holds you in such high esteem?
^Emperor Ducksly "The Captain appears to view you very highly. I never really understood why, but I'm curious if these pranks of yours are a cause.
^Emperor Ducksly "You're able to refer to the Captain so casually...
^Officer JV "I wish it was something as 'intricate' as all that Ducksly. The Captain and I just go way back.
^Emperor Ducksly "Please... He even allows your little microgames to stay on the ship's software.
^Officer JV "Wait, Ducksly, he knows about those?
^Emperor Ducksly "Whimisical nature, eh? You'll have to show me this sometime.
^Officer JV "Ya know what? Sure. Game sees game.
Reprimand_JV: ^Emperor Ducksly "Why would you do something like that?
^Officer JV "Calm down, it's just a joke. And like I said it's an easy fix.
^Emperor Ducklsy "You always do this. You know, every one of your pranks hinders my own work.
^Emperor Ducksly "You only get away with this because the Captain views you so highly.
^Officer JV "Dude chill, it's like 2 lines of code. I can literally come fix it right now.
^Emperor Ducksly "I'll never understand what the Captain sees in you. I'm smarter, more ambitious, and I don't go around breaking other people's equipment.
^Emperor Ducksly "I'm stepping out from the lab for a little while. This had better be fixed when I return.
Day2_PrivateConvoChoice: ^Cpt Baha "Comms Officer Dover, I'd like to speak with you if you are free?
^Officer JV "Doverrrr, can we talk for a minute?
^Emperor Ducksly "Greetings, Dover. Are you available for a conversational exchange?
Day2_Dover_Baha: ^Cpt Baha "Lieutenant Dover, everything alright in the comm's room?
^Lt Dover "Well you know...just patching people when need be. Homebase still doesn't pick up but that's to be expected.
^Lt Dover "Is...Is that all you wanted to say to me Sir?
D2_B_JVB: ^Cpt Baha "No well, I just spoke with J.V and I'm not sure what I'm feeling right now.
^Cpt Baha "Well I decided I would share some of my writing with her. It's been something that I've been trying to open myself to doing more.
^Lt Dover "Well go on spill the details! How did it feel?
^Cpt Baha "I'm not sure... that's why I'm here talking to you.
^Lt Dover "Sorry. Got caught up in the excitement?
^Cpt Baha "I fail to see the excitement.
^Lt Dover "That takes a lot of guts!
^Cpt Baha "Either way, I'm beginning to understand that my taste in prose is a very specific taste.

g-0: ^Cpt Baha "I guess, now that I think about it, it felt nice to be able open up like that.
^Lt Dover "That makes sense, they say one's writing is a window into their soul!
^Cpt Baha "I've not heard this quote, who said it?
^Lt Dover "Oh... um...You know the name is slipping my mind right now.

D2_B_JVD: ^Cpt Baha "No well...See I've decided I would try to share my writing more. I was going to go to J.V...but-
^Lt Dover "Well I'm sure you'll be able to catch her some other time.

^Lt Dover "What? Why do you say that?
^Cpt Baha "I don't know maybe I'm just over thinking.
^Cpt Baha "It shouldn't be, but this is very...mentally taxing for me.
^Lt Dover "I get it man, you're doing something you're not used to.
^Lt Dover "Just gotta try again and not let this whole thing get you down.

s: ^Maybe you should share your writing with everyone!
^You should stop relying on J.V to make you seem friendly.

g-1: ^Lt Dover "Calling people by their rank isn't going to make you seem more friendly.

BESTENDING: ^The day has arrived. No more preparation, no more waiting.
^The crew gather on the Bridge to greet the Edge.
^Hands clapped on shoulders, grasped in one another. Together. Human, Duck. Flawed, but trying. You've made it.
MIDENDING: ^The day has arrived. No more preparation, no more waiting.
^The crew gather on the Bridge to greet the Edge.
^They all stand together, yet still apart, somehow. Some friends, some less than. You've made it, though.
WORSTENDING: ^The day has arrived. No more preparation, no more waiting.
^The crew gather on the Bridge to greet the Edge.
^Everyone stands apart, a pall over what should be a momentous event. You've made it, but how they all wish things could be different.
